title: PERMA BANNED FOR THIS? IVE MET PEOPLE WAY MORE TOXIC AND THIS WAS A 2 DAYS AGO!
body:
I WAS BANNED FOR THIS AND ALL THESE GAMES I WAS BEING SEVERLY CURSED OUT PLEASE READ THE LOGS AND UNDERSTAND THAT I WAS KEEPING MY CALM AND NOT CURSING THE WHOLE TIME WHILE I WAS BEING ASSULTED! PLEASE HELP I DO NOT DESERVE THIS BAN IM A VERY NICE PERSON AND I ALWAYS SUPPORT MY TEAM-MATES!

PLEASE I LOVE LEAUGE DONT BAN ME GIVE ME ANOTHER CHANCE I WONT TALK AGAIN PLEASE PLEASE :((((( YOU HAVE TO UNDERSTAND THAT PEOPLE ON THIS GAME ARE RUTHLESS AND HAVE QUEUES WITH MUTIPLE FRIENDS THAT WILL ALL REPORT U TOGETHER AND MAKE YOU SEEM LIKE THE BAD GUY BUY IM NOT! :(((

replies.body:
> I DO NOT DESERVE THIS BAN IM A VERY NICE PERSON AND I ALWAYS SUPPORT MY TEAM-MATES!

> Satan with brest: im stealing all ur kills
Satan with brest: ur not plat 3
Satan with brest: no way

I read the chat logs, and they are not supporting your team. While these chat logs alone may not have been enough for a perma ban, they are enough when your previous punishments are taken into account. In the period of about a month and a half you received a 10-game chat restriction, a 25-game chat-restriction, a 14-day ban, and finally a perma-ban.

In your 14-day ban email you were warned that further unsportsmanlike conduct would result in a perma-ban.
I suppose it is appropriate that RiotTantrum would be in charge of responding to this one.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Tantram,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=WvvJEXez,comment-id=000c,timestamp=2016-04-15T21:28:59.996+0000)
>
> Satan with brest: ur not plat 3
> Satan with brest: no way
> 
> I read the chat logs, and they are not supporting your team. While these chat logs alone may not have been enough for a perma ban, they are enough when your previous punishments are taken into account. In the period of about a month and a half you received a 10-game chat restriction, a 25-game chat-restriction, a 14-day ban, and finally a perma-ban.
> 
> In your 14-day ban email you were warned that further unsportsmanlike conduct would result in a perma-ban.

Your name, is perfect. :3

When you talk negatively more than you actually play the game, that's not a good sign. Asking players to report your team is something that doesn't contribute positively to the game at all. Check out the Behavior Worthy of a Champion article for some tips on becoming a more positive player:

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751874-Behavior-Worthy-of-a-Champion

> [{quoted}](name=Wuks,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=WvvJEXez,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-04-15T01:45:25.013+0000)
>
> When you talk ... more than you actually play the game, that's not a good sign.

I removed 1 word, and it still makes just as much sense.
Adding to that, when you are on the "last life", even the smallest amount of verifiable toxicity is enough to push you over for a permaban
When you on you're last life that should make it harder because it IS a perma ban. why can't they just silence you for more and more time? for players like me thats the real problem!

Because of you can't make the effort to change in the face of a complete removal from the game, why should they make it harder? You have to show that you are genuinely different, that not even a hint of toxicity is still there. And if you can't do that, then Riot and the player base would prefer it if you weren't
IF MY TEAM IS FEEDING AM I SUPPOST TO BE HAPPY ABOUT THAT? AM I SUPPOST TO SAY AW WELL, I JUST WASTED ABOUT AN HOUR OF MY LIFE AND BE FINE WITH IT? NO!

You act like an adult and don't let a game define how you act. You can be angry, sure. I've had to deal with teammates acting stupid, sometimes costing me the game. But do I let it make me insult, belittle, degrade, and talk down to my teammates? No. Because I have morals and principles that dictate how I act towards other people, whether that person is standing in front of my or across the computer screen

But please i do not deserve this! if you read the logs they were constantly attacking me and its HUMAN NATURE to want to defend yourself! i will silence people if they be toxic towards me but please i do not deserve this ban! i have fun playing leauge and most of the times im extremely nice and actually support people when they do well! i do not see what i done wrong but i will try and chat less but please unban ;(

>i do not see what i done wrong

There's the problem.
Hello. I would like a blue name please.

Hah, apply like everyone else, and make sure you don't have any negative history...
Ohwaitaminute.

Where can I apply?

\#neverbeenchatrestricted

That's not what I meant when I said negative history.

You are a little coarse with your responses towards toxic players.
Nami, on the other hand, has almost always kept up the same friendly and helpful demeanor no matter who he dealt with.
Yep. Even I probably wouldn't get in, as I'm pretty biting/sarcastic a lot of times, particularly to people complaining about permabans

I am pretty silent in every game i play.

Aside from calming people down and saying the occasional Good Job, Well Done, Well Played i barely talk as a support.

I simply let my actions define the future of the match. Which is part of a huge reason that I win alot of games be it vs a full premade team or with random people( well I always solo-que so i am always with random people).

People just need to have a positive attitude and not being dishearten by a few deaths early on in the game.
I had a game where my ADC died 2 times pretty early and he was half-way giving up so I went aggressive once and made an opening for my ADC to get a kill (almost a double), that alone raised his spirit and we won the match.

Anyway I agree with PeponiPoro.
Oh not in games. In game I usually don't say much, I was talking about here on the boards
Oh well.. if its on boards its a different story entirely..
Your points above are well thought out, though. You do give logical answers in response, at least on this thread, even if they are somewhat coarse/biting.

This one was actually Wuks, not Nami, but I didn't even realize that until I scrolled back up for another reason.
Your point is still valid though! Blue names belong to people who can control themselves when dealing with difficult people, and not respond with passive aggressive comments or flat out aggressive comments. They actually provide a constructive response.

Pffft

I'm the nicest and most friendly person on the boards.

> [{quoted}](name=PDE5 Inhib,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=WvvJEXez,comment-id=0000000200010000,timestamp=2016-04-15T02:08:22.668+0000)
>
> Aaaand now I can tell you're just a confirmed troll. Bye Felicia.

No you are not.
I'm confused as to how that is being un-nice? Felicia was trolling so I told her goodbye.
Instead of attempting to help him further, you just flat out called him a troll and used a shitty meme.
There is no 'help' to "you're being a kiss-ass so you don't know what a toxic player is". Saying the truth isn't being "mean". A fact is a fact.

Nami says the truth almost every time.
She doesn't say it like an ass though.

An Arbiter's position is to be a helpful presence on the board.
If you want to insult other board goers your not going to get a Blue Name.
What part is an insult?
You don't think calling someone a troll is an insult?

And if they aren't trolling?
You think calling them a troll when they are not trolling isn't an insult?

Arbiters are not privy to any more information behind the scenes than a regular poster. They don't get the truth of whether or not someone has trolled in a game or if their forum posts are because of trolling or just ignorance.

In one case they are insulting the poster and in the other they are Name and Shaming the poster. Do you really think either of those cases fall under "being a helpful presence on the board"?
They don't do it very easy. Nami just recently got his, and he had asked about months before.
PDE5 Inhib > Deep Terror Nami (I think that's her name)
(DTN is a guy)
(Nami is girl character)
Yes but the actual person "Deep Terror Nami", the arbiter, is a guy.
If I'm in a game and playing with a Nami, I'm going to call the person a she. Keeps it simple.
If you knowingly misgender someone, you're an asshole.{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}

Calling someone the gender of the champ they're playing is being an asshole?

How sensitive are you people lmfao

Because Nami isn't playing a champ, he's posting on the boards. Thinking he's a girl because of the summoner name initially is no big deal, but deliberately saying you'll misgender him because of his name when you've been corrected is a dick move. The others are right, there's no way you'll be blue.
But she is still Nami. Nami is female.
The champ is female. The arbiter is not. Calling the arbiter 'she' is an asshole move. You can't seriously think otherwise?
I did. And j have spoken with DTN, here in the boards, in game/client, and on Twitter. He's a guy.

Its not about the champ they are playing.
Its about _**knowingly**_ misgendering someone.

You didn't know before(I assume), but you do now.
If you don't know the player's gender, or are speaking to someone who doesn't, its tolerable/forgivable because you/they only have the champ to go off of. But at this point, you know, so you are willfully choosing to ignore the persons actual gender and apply a potentially unwanted label to them.

And of course, more important than any of this is what Deep Terror Nami thinks.
Don't bother, Erdrik. I smell a bait, that's why I stopped replying.
Imo, doesn't matter. I am just a fish.
Wow, I'd never seen someone with a blue name before xD. Are you like a special type of rioter or something? (Excuse my ignorance)

> [{quoted}](name=Psychoneirik,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=WvvJEXez,comment-id=00000004,timestamp=2016-04-15T23:51:12.846+0000)
>
> Wow, I'd never seen someone with a blue name before xD. Are you like a special type of rioter or something? (Excuse my ignorance)

http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-behavior-moderation/opVBd7rZ-introducing-the-arbiters

I don't understand why people think that just because you don't curse means that you aren't toxic. Calling a player garbage is toxic. Calling teammates or opponents retards is toxic behavior. Refusing to fight because you don't get along is toxic behavior. Mate I'm sorry but your ban is more than deserved. When you see that you're actually the one in the wrong, maybe that'll be when you're ready to reform. If you're a nice person in real life, then be a nice person in league. You're going out of your way to attack people and it's not right. "But they did it first". It doesn't matter, be the bigger person and let it end there and report them at the end of the match. Good luck in your journey of becoming better not only as a player, but as a person. :)
